thread.title: HENRICO COUNTY COUNCIL PTA
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by HENRICO COUNTY COUNCIL PTA

author: HENRICO COUNTY COUNCIL PTA
title: HENRICO COUNTY COUNCIL PTA
text: We had a tight budget to work with for our medals and ribbons. This left us with an online option rather than a local vendor. They were so personal-ble to work with. It was like working with the local vendor. They walked us through our questions. Made suggestions as needed.
